query:
INSERT INTO `alert_thresholds` (`name`, `metricType`, `resourceType`, `warningThreshold`, `criticalThreshold`, `isEnabled`, `cooldownMinutes`) VALUES
('CPU Usage - Cluster', 'cpu', 'cluster', 80, 95, true, 5),
('Memory Usage - Cluster', 'memory', 'cluster', 80, 95, true, 5),
('Disk Usage - Cluster', 'disk', 'cluster', 80, 95, true, 15),
('CPU Usage - Containers', 'cpu', 'container', 80, 95, true, 5),
('Memory Usage - Containers', 'memory', 'container', 80, 95, true, 5),
('CPU Usage - Pods', 'cpu', 'pod', 80, 95, true, 5),
('Memory Usage - Pods', 'memory', 'pod', 80, 95, true, 5);
